name: Katam Nikhil Teja
bio: Passionate about quantum computing and event management. Leading the organization of Qiskit Fall Fest 2025.

name: Priya Sharma
bio: Quantum computing enthusiast with experience in Qiskit and quantum algorithms. Manages technical workshops.

name: Rohan Verma
bio: Hackathon veteran and quantum hardware enthusiast. Coordinates the campus hackathon and mentoring.

bio: Social media strategist and community builder. Handles event promotion and speaker coordination.

bio: Ensures smooth event operations and manages venue logistics. Expert in event planning and execution.

name: Sneha Joshi
bio: Creative designer responsible for event branding, promotional materials, and website design.
